website_summaries.verdict: A popular dual-tap kegerator with rolling casters.
pros: This dual-tap keg can fit one full-size keg or two sixth barrel kegs
Setup is straightforward, and while ventilation doesn’t allow this keg to be placed flush against a wall, the casters make it easy to move around if need be
cons: The analog thermostat does not allow for fine-tuning of the temperature

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the duckbill neoprene washers!!! Please add to the installation guide!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please update the directions on EdgeStar Beer Dispenser Installation Guide step 11, "Attach Co2 Line to Coupler," to include a reference to the necessary washer/gasket that the warranty tech describes as looking like a duck bill. We went through 2 bottles of Co2 trying to figure out a very simple issue. The tech said that many people throw these away as they don't appear to have an opening and act like plugs, BUT with pressure the opening that you can't see will work. We are out $65 plus time and frustration trying to fix an issue (leaking lines and couplers) that could have very easily been avoided if the directions made reference to the part I referenced previously.
customer_reviews.author: From CA

customer_reviews.title: YES, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Made the jump from binge drinker to full-blown alcoholic! Converted mine to ball lock to keg homebrew, just takes barbed ball lock poppets (a gas in and a liquid out), ball lock kegs and some hose clamps and boom, 24 hour party time. If I feel lazy switch back to the sake taps the kegerator came with and buy a keg from the store. Mine had no problem keeping beer sub 38 degrees. CO2 regulator is terribly inaccurate but just get to know it and you will be fine wit carbonation. 2 beers on tap all the time? Game changer.
customer_reviews.author: PickleNick

customer_reviews.title: Get better gas line check valves and beer line washers and this is a pretty good kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but the washers/o-rings that it came with are absolute trash. I first discovered this as a fountain of brown ale came blasting out from between the coupler and the tightening nut when I connected the first keg. The following evening, I went to pull the tap and nothing came out...turns out my gas tank had emptied overnight...this is because the check valves used in the gas line are also terrible and made of that same material. If you get this kegerator, I recommend buying replacement check valves and washer. Don't even bother using the default ones, it should only cost you a couple bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Daedalus Esquire

customer_reviews.title: great kegerator
customer_reviews.text: what could be better than beer in your house? everything is good quality, you may want to upgrade to stainless steel hose clamps (<$5). fits two 1/6 bbl kegs very nicely, variety is the spice of life. took a 6 pack to setup, ended up opening up the keg side rubber restrictors a bit, beer was pouring too slow. keep pressure at 12 psi to prevent flat beer. otherwise, this is the greatest thing since sliced bread and not as complicated as you think to operate.
customer_reviews.author: wootaholic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After having this for a few months I must say....I LOVE IT!!! This is in my basement and hold temp exceptionally well. I couldn't be happier with the purchase. The unit is quite and keeps my beer cold! I love the fact that this is not one of the overly complicated units. It is truly a set it and forget it configuration!
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Not A Happy Store Owner
customer_reviews.text: It lasted less then 9 months. It read 32 degrees F but never got to 41. It is really tight for three sixtels but you can close the door. Now it shows 32 still but isn’t even 55 degrees and can’t get any response from the seller. I run a small deli and keep our beer in this. I am loosing lots now since this refrigeration is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver Creek Farm

customer_reviews.title: Great dual tap for commerical or homebrew beer.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Assembly was quick and easy. Casters went on with ease. Hooking up the gas line was no problem. I converted it for use with 5 gallon corny kegs for home brew. Just had to cut the liquid line to disconnect the sankey connection and replace with ball lock. Some other reviews have mentioned having trouble getting it cold and staying cold. I've so far not had any trouble and its been consistently holding between 35 and 39 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: PhantomLord

customer_reviews.title: Draft beer on tap, but needs minor upgrades.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together, and what's better than draft beer at home?! As some have said here, the first beer poured is mostly foam, and it happens again if you leave it longer than 30 minutes between pours. Wrapped a towel around it, which seemed to help, so ordered a neoprene sleeve to see if it solved the problem. If not, then I'll need to consider a fan. Generally much quieter than I expected. No "refrigerator running" noises, but occasional squeaks from the CO2 pressurizing are a small nuisance. Hardly worth mentioning, really.
customer_reviews.author: Merej213

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m not giving this 5 stars is because we had a minor issue with the co2 leaking where the lines connect to the keg.. nothing my husband couldn’t fix with some special tape tho. Overall we have ZERO regrets. Like, I LOVE this thing. It really tops the cake in my dinning room/bar area. Beer really does taste better and is kept at a colder temperature in this thing. This is the best adult toy we’ve ever purchased lol.
customer_reviews.author: Butt farts

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - Can't be Pushed Flush to Back Wall
customer_reviews.text: Good kegerator for the money. It's basically a dorm refrigerator that has been converted to a kegerator. Fits two 1/4 kegs nicely. C02 bottle is outside the refrigerator compartment. As a result, the unit must sit about 6" from the wall. Would have been better if the C02 bottle could have been mounted inside so that the refrigerator could be pushed against the back wall.
customer_reviews.author: NEK SNPR

customer_reviews.title: A must have/fun to have item for the beer snob in you.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Quiet and well made except for the thermostat; it's crap. I installed a Supco SC1002 cold control ($25 thermostat) and it works great. A few things you should know before you buy a kegerator. You electric bill will increase a whopping $5 a month. You won't drink as much as you think, but when you do drink, you won't keep track. No bottles to clean up, less trips to the store, fresh beer, and let us not forget the cool factor.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Don’t throw away coupler duck bill valves!
customer_reviews.text: Kegerator is amazing, but the instructions for assembly could use a bit more detail. The assembly is not difficult, however I threw away some small valves in the couplers thinking that it was packing material and it caused the kegerator to not function once I got everything put together. Also, it should be pointed out that you’ll need to get the CO2 canister filled - doesn’t ship full. I realize that seems obvious, but there was no mention in instructions
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Bateman

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Like most others, I had to replace a few parts from the initial packaging. Some of the initial couplers and tubing had leaking issues. Add another $25-$50 onto this price if you want to make sure its effective and efficient. Unless most of us are just getting unlucky. With that being said, after you have it running and know how to use it, I definitely enjoy my dual tab, fresh keg beer!
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts and air leaks.
customer_reviews.text: It came with plastic hose clamps that totally do the job, the teeth broke off. After going to a hardware store getting proper clamps, retighting everything and clamping down. Hooked up the c02 tank, the couplers that came with the fridge are worthless, totally leak c02 and leaked out a full tank in less then 12 hours. I ordered new stainless steel couplers that will hopefully resolve the isse. FYI you cant return this product on amazon due to hazardous materials clauses. Be aware when you purchase it, that you wont be able to return it. Parts and accessories are all super flimsy and cheap. After spending $200 more on parts hopefully it will work. Thumbs down!!!
customer_reviews.author: druha421

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly in a pretty beat-up box, but nothing damaged and everything accounted for. My only real critique is with parts supplied. The instructions (with pictures) depict and specifically describe three blue CO2 hoses. However, the ones in my kit were orange?.. They seemed good quality. Additionally, they also describe and depict metal hose clamps, although cheap plastic ones were provided that barely fit.. Had to use channel locks and a bear grip to get them to fasten. The C02 tank and regulator looked to be very good quality on the other hand. I haven't hooked up and pressurized a keg just yet, so not sure how it will hold up but will update my review once that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Turned it to between 4 and 5 and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Turned it to between 4 and 5 and it nearly froze a few 7UP the kids had put in. Works great. Very quiet. Shipping was outstandingly fast but it must have been a little rough. The box with all of the accessories bounced around inside bending the shelves. I bent them back no problem. Only thing that could be helpful is if the hoses to the tape were marked left and right..
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: The package was exactly as advertised. The unit comes with everything you need to get started right away and includes a book of parts that can be upgraded. unit looks nice stand alone but I installed mine to under the counter of an outdoor kitchen with taps drilled through the granite counter top. I would definitely recommend this package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine runs at about 45 degrees at full cool and the friend had to put a temperature regulator ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing quite a while now and purchased another for a friend as a wedding gift. Mine runs at about 45 degrees at full cool and the friend had to put a temperature regulator on his to keep it from freezing over. The compressor makes very very loud noises when cutting on and off. Aside from that it has worked fine. Fits my two pin lock corney kegs just wonderfully with room for a Hop Randall and a couple of bottles of beer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Great Kegerator for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my homebrew. The set up was much easier than I was expecting, just had to switch out to ball lock connectors. My only issue is with the temperature controls. I was hoping to keep beer around 38 degrees. I initially set at 4 and my beer line froze up. I now have it set at the warmest setting (not even to 1) and I'm still at 33 degrees. But overall, great experience. It came to my house withing 2 days of ordering, perfect condition (great packaging), and it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: Parts are cheap and crappy
customer_reviews.text: The parts that come with it don’t match the printed instructions of the manufacturer video. Example, they recommend metal hose clamps but send cheap plastic ones. I spent 3 days and 3 tanks of CO2 trying to find leaks in this system. I think the design might be good, and the refrigerator works fine, but the hoses and fittings that come with it are total garbage. I wish I could give zero stars. I callled customer service to ask for help, 30 minutes on hold and then nothing. Save yourself a headache, don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: LUKE BARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Great product but needs new washers
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for but not ready out of the box! The white plastic washers that come with the product are not strong enough and you will spew beer all over your house! You will need specialty keg washers, not the kind you can get at the local hardware shop but a quick search online will turn up the correct washers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen & Will M

customer_reviews.title: Beer, its what's for dinner
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about this kegorator, do yourself a favor and just get it. It works great! I did upgrade the faucets and bought a tower cooling fan. The unit did come with a damaged door, but the seller was super awesome and sent me a replacement door !!!. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: JohnV

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, low maintenance, good results
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together! Holds both temperature and pressure perfectly. It took us about two weeks to empty the first keg and temperatures and pressure stayed perfectly stable the hole time without adjustments. The only thing I want to point out is that you should make sure your fave brew is available in the size you want before you buy. I had a few surprises, but in the end it all worked out well
customer_reviews.author: Robert.Encinitas

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d bought one years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great kegerator. Nicely holds 2 sixth barrels. Temp control works great and keeps the beer really cold if you like. Absolutely love the ability to have 2 different beers on tap. Nice taps and keg hardware. I upgraded to Perlick faucets to prevent sticking but the faucets that came with it work great. I can’t imagine what more you would get by paying much more for a higher end kegerator. I highly recommend this kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wassink

customer_reviews.title: It has been an excellent purchase. Note it does not come with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the edgestar for several months now, other than the tap handles sticking if you don't use it all the time, It has been an excellent purchase. Note it does not come with a filled tank, so plan on getting it filled. 1 tanks has lasted me about 6 kegs and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product/ Confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, and I haven't had any issues or complaints with the actual product. Be aware that certain components might not be the same as the instructions. So it may mention blue tubes and you notice you have none. But you do have red tubes that aren't referenced. Same thing with metal and plastic clips. Move slow and keep a count all the pieces and you can put it together without issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby’s dream come true. Slightly tricky to assemble for someone completely inexperienced with kegerators, but we did it and it works GREAT! The hose clamps are plastic instead of metal and were pretty hard to “clamp.”
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy, and meets everything that we wanted in having a home 'kegger'. I did trim some of the CO2 hoses to make it less clutter inside the unit. You will definitely need to replace the hose clamps with the stainless still type clamps. I promptly through the plastic ones supplied away.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to assemble & customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: The beer is cold, the look is clean, it's easy to assemble & customer service is great! Perfect birthday gift for my husband. The only issue I had was my fault... when assembling I was playing around with the pieces & when I tapped the 1/2 barrel keg I didn't close the unused beer line & the CO2 continuously leaked out. It didn't take long for my husband to figure it out so we filled the CO2 cylinder again & was back in business. Easy mistake for first time kegerator owners. Now it's time to start testing other beers out so we can use both taps.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Already broke twice
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 4 months and it's broken twice already. The first time I had to send the fridge back and get a replacement one. This replacement fridge only lasted 2 weeks before it broke as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product great customer service thank you!!! Highly recommend will purchase other items in there future grin these guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s like Christmas all year!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family gathers around this kegerator and it changed the way we enjoy our home brews AND store brews.
customer_reviews.author: Tdiggity

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cold beer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend to cheer him up. I think he rely likes it. And it's awesome to have beer on the ready. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HLR

customer_reviews.title: so good. Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy enough to assemble. Tapped a 1/6th of Saranac Legacy IPA. Waiting for my home brew kegs to be ready. Will update..... 4-8-20 received a new one for camp. So far, so good. One thing, this seller didn't mark the box "this side up" so as I later found out, it shipped upside down. Not a great thing for a refrigerator. Hopefully, no issues due to that.
customer_reviews.author: Justine  Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pours cold beer
customer_reviews.text: The over all is so far so good the beer is cold . The clamps that come with the lines are plastic they should be replaced with metal clamps also it only comes with domestic keg taps had to buy a a different tap for Heineken, Stella ect. euro Bees but still so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Tatooruss

customer_reviews.title: Love the Dual Tap
customer_reviews.text: Who wouldn't love a dual tap kegerator? Came with all instructions needed to setup the kegerator--was completed quickly and easily in about an hour or so. Keeps the kegs cold and the beer flowing. When using two 1/6th kegs, there is still a little room to use as a fridge on the bottom, if needed. And, it looks nice too. Great for parties or just grabbing a cold one after work. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Shipping was fast and free. Setup was very easy, took less than a half hour. All you need to do is get the CO2 tank filled and beer and you are good to go. I've found it keeps the beer ice cold and it's not at its highest setting. I have found it to be loud like other reviewers. It's no louder than a normal mini fridge. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Very good  Quality for all the parts also  stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Son 45th Birthday He LOVES it He puts beer he Buys by the ka From brews
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with regulator as it states
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it’s going to be great! But it just arrived and is missing the regulator when it clearly states it has one with it. So another $70 for something that should have been included in an already growing investment. To get these going takes several hundred dollars on top of the unit, so to add this is really frustrating. Hopeful it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Party hardy
customer_reviews.text: We really love this keg. As far as presentation it’s good just wish it came with identifiable handles for the two handles. A precious review hit it on the head saying it was pretty great minus some pipe tape needed for small leaks in the connections but otherwise good!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great but a touch too small.
customer_reviews.text: Great kegerator..... But.... Some of my local craft breweries here in beer city USA (Bells Two Hearted Ale.... Slim keg and Perrin Black IPA.. sixth keg) which are the only two beers we drink you cannot fit a slim and a sixth barrel in this. Prior to purchasing this, check with your local breweries to find out what size kegs they offer..... Don't get stuck with a warm keg.....
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday. He loves it! It is a great price. It is very quiet and easy to assemble. Others mentioned having to buy replacement parts, but we didn't have any issues. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Apulizzano

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brothers wedding, and now I'm jealous, so I bought one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Brave13OC

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room to fit a full sized keg. Easy to assemble. Moves very easy with the included wheels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kegerator is a generator of FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Fathers Day and he is ecstatic!! He installed it and he said it was easy. Came in a durable packaging. We have been enjoying this for the last 2 months and it’s never failed us! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kareen Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I use it for my cold coffee and still have room for a beer keg, when my husband desires one.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I had this setup with the beer store I got the kegs from. Overall, it was fairly straight forward. Great kegerator for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Shea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps 2 kegs very cold and is very handy to have around...if you love beer!
customer_reviews.author: david n.

customer_reviews.title: Draft beer all the time!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've had this several months now and have been very pleased!! Its like the bar is at your house!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It came without one of the holes drilled for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It came without one of the holes drilled for the 4 caster wheels. We had to contact the manufacturer and get a new one delivered, repackage the one with faulty construction, and return it. All of that hassle when all they need is some quality control. How do you sell a product when you don’t even make sure it is constructed properly?
customer_reviews.author: Janelle K. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Drink Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kegerator. It holds two 5 gallon kegs and has two taps. It is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma M

customer_reviews.title: Improper supplies
customer_reviews.text: The kegerator didn’t come with enough clamps to keep c02 from leaking out. I have to refill my tank 4 times and get metal clamps to stop the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nostalgia brand kegerator before and it NEVER worked properly. Replaced it with this one and now I couldnt be happier. Quality product, quality parts, works every time. Great kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Salvato

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a housewarming gift. The couple love it. They are on the second keg. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Me

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. only problem is trying to find 1/6 kegs domestic brands .miller lite comes in 1/4 slims not 1/6 kegs. which does fit but then you can not fit two kegs in fridge. so maybe a design update to interior to fit the kegs available in most markets in us.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for two years with no problem. Keeps beer cold, super great add to my man cave/shop.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Fulks

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, very easy to use, great product. This is the 3rd one I have bought for two different apartments and a house. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Warthog

customer_reviews.title: BAD REGULATOR !!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this unit was working properly until just before my "first keg" was almost empty the CO2 bottle was out of CO2. Normally 5 lbs of CO2 will dispense around 12 - 13 1/6th kegs not "1" ! That's when I found that the CO2 regulator that came with the unit was defective and leaked out. So I went to my local beer distributor and purchased a much better regulator and haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great value for dual tap
customer_reviews.text: The only negative to this purchase was that it did not include assembly instructions. We were able to go online though and print out. Seems like a great purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: It is working great as of now have 2 kegs in it and a party this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kegerator arrived with no damage and was packed in a box within another box and well protected. Setup was very simple and it works as well as I could have imagined. I have two 1/6 kegs on tap and the beer is ice cold and flowing freely. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: grandpagreg

customer_reviews.title: Good Kegerator for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my homebrew in. I changed out the lines to work with ball lock fittings. Also purchased a tower cooler because all I was getting was foam, turned the fridge up to cool down even more and ended up freezing my beer. For the price good kegerator. Definitely recommend the tower cooler/blower.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It's great, quiet and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It's great, quiet and easy to set up. I have one tap for my home brew and 1 for a commercial keg of whatever I want. Looks awesome in my home bar!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Best drunken investment you can make!
customer_reviews.text: Totally a drunk purchase but it works amazingly! You just need to follow some short easy installation instructions, fill the included CO2 tank and find a beer distributor that sells 5 gal sixtels so you can have two different types of beers in it.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: No issues. Sits at 34 degrees Have two one ...
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Sits at 34 degrees Have two one is single tap. Keep full keg of bud light in one and 1/6 of Sam Adams and Dos Equis in two tap. UPDATE- 18 months of constant running. Still works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Smalltown

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great when it works. Have had multiple problems with the CO2 regulator leaking. Customer service was quick to respond the first few times asking me check different things. Now that I have done that and still having a problem they won’t respond.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product with some issues but good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works great so far. (I've had it for about 3 weeks now). The regulator gauge was defective so I contacted Compact Appliance and they shipped me a new one. Good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: A lot of foam.... never worked correctly no matter what we tried. I guess you get what you pay for😣
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday win
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it !!! He couldn’t be happier... also so happy I didn’t pay two day shipping cause it was at my house in two days !!! That was a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think or getting price was a little bit hi for what they sent
customer_reviews.text: Unit was dented there was no gaskets and missing hose clamps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not clear
customer_reviews.text: Tap installation instructions are not sufficient for a first time user, you will need to study a bit before you put it together. The Refrigerator unit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carla O Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great kegerator good price
customer_reviews.text: Packed very good no damage, received in 2 days, I would have upgraded the regulator if I had a choice though. It is a little noisey when switching between cycles but its in my bar so no big deal to me, buy a tower cooler when purchasing also.
customer_reviews.author: glenn shepard

customer_reviews.title: The Co2 tank doesnt come with ratings so no one will fill it.  Had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Does keep beverage cold. It's not meant for outdoors, the top warped. The Co2 tank doesnt come with ratings so no one will fill it. Had to buy a new one. That was an extra $100. To big to just send back.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was a little scared to buy the KC2000. I am super pleased. Beer is cold and it was easy to put together. Just watch the YouTube video on it. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: john 1973 vwbus

customer_reviews.title: Kegerator!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, setup is a breeze. Solid build, best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kegerator. I will say that the reviewers saying ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kegerator. I will say that the reviewers saying to watch the youtube video are correct, it's really necessary. The parts and instructions provided are a little confusing. But this thing keeps beer perfect!
customer_reviews.author: NG02001

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keg
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy to hook up and have been using two taps the whole time! Easy to keep cold and good flow on the beers!
customer_reviews.author: DMinOC

customer_reviews.title: Great unit when it was working!
customer_reviews.text: Started out loving the unit. 33 degree beer was awesome! Steadily has gotten warmer over 7 months and now only gets down to 60 degrees. I hope EdgeStar can help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Beer stays cold and tastes great! Feels just like a Tap House!
customer_reviews.author: Woodstockluv

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and does exactly what you want to do. Deliver super cold beer!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Engle

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We have two 6th barrels in currently ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We have two 6th barrels in currently and it works great. Would absolutely purchase again. Easy to install and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: First time using the kegerator the PRV on the regulator blew out. Have contacted seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a dual regulator but that's the only hassel. Everything works good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kegerator.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my coffee company with our cold brew it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beer lovers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to built. Once I did, it looked great and after I got the co2 tanks works amazing. Recommended to everyone who loves beers
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Cold beer, minimal foam, consistent pours. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Max P.

customer_reviews.title: Process has been difficult at best.
customer_reviews.text: Product not as described with regards to measurements. Will be returning to seller. Process has been difficult at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator unit stopped cooling completely after just 3 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: james green

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This will not fit two quarter kegs. Will be expensive to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up on time and it was exactly as advertised. It was a complete unit and with a little bit of assembly required it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Love this but understand the size of keg it can hold
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Make sure you understand that it holds two 1/6 kegs or one 1/4 keg. Came with no assembly directions; I had to go online.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This has been the very best gift I have ever purchased. My husband has taken it on like a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very enjoyed bday gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Total game changer to have this in the house. I am not a huge drinker, and really love the ability to pour small amounts at a time while at the same time having a steady supply from the two taps to satisfy any groups that come over. The prodoct is very high quality and shipping was great. Its VERY heavy in the box, so if you have to move it up stairs, or even just up the drive way you will want help. Once assembled, its easy to move on its built in wheels
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the cost. Reaches Tampa in the mid to high 30's.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Escontrias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S.

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Easy to assemble. Stays cold and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Girtman

customer_reviews.title: Stuff happens, but still a great product
customer_reviews.text: While we did not receive the exact kegerator we ordered (black instead of stainless steel), the unit we did receive is in great working order with no line leaks at all and is keep our beer nice and cold. The customer service department was also great to deal with as they credited us for the difference in price and also sent out a deluxe keg line cleaning kit. While i wish we had the stainless steel, it is not a deal breaker at all, as we plan to install it in a build in bar in a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Perkowski

customer_reviews.title: Co2 leaks
customer_reviews.text: Does not account for enough washers, co2 will severely leak
customer_reviews.author: Jayden a williamson

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed was here and easy to understand instructions
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit enjoyed my first tapped beer today
customer_reviews.author: D.Casey

product_meta.title: EdgeStar KC2000TWIN Full Size Dual Tap Kegerator & Draft Beer Dispenser - Black
feature_bullets: Stores up to a full sized half shell Sankey standard keg or two sixth kegs; does NOT support use of Coors, Miller rubberized or other oversized kegs
Temperatures: Low 30s to mid 40s degrees; rolling casters included for easy mobility; Protective floor plate
For freestanding use only; 5 lb. CO2 cylinder (supplied empty) included with external or internal mounting capabilities
External Dimensions: 48 1/2 x 20 1/10 x 24 13/16 (height includes the draft tower); Warranty 90 days labor 1 year parts
For a stainless steel version please see model KC2000SSTWIN, for a single tap KC2000, single tap stainless KC2000SSA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
